characters.name: BETTY
characters.introduction: YOUR GIRLFRIEND BETTY CLOSES THE DOOR BEHIND HER AND GIVES YOU A BIG SMILE. SHE'S WEARING A NAVY BLUE AND WHITE POLKA DOTTED SWING DRESS WITH A MODEST BOAT NECKLINE, BLACK GLOVES COVER HER HANDS, AND WHITE BOBBY SOCKS WITH A PAIR OF BLACK MARY JANES' ADORN HER FEET. THOUGH YOU FIND HER BEAUTIFUL IN ANY SITUATUION, SHE REALLY SEEMS TO SHINE TONIGHT. SHE LOOKS AT YOU AND GIVES A BIG SMILE, "READY TO GO? DON'T WANT TO MISS THE START OF THE MOVIE, I WANT TO MAKE SURE WE HAVE TIME TO GET POPCORN BEFORE IT STARTS." SHE LOOKS AT YOU EXPECTANTLY.
responses: "LET'S GO OUTSIDE AND SEE THAT NEW CAR YOU'VE BEEN HANKERING ON ABOUT."
help: "LET'S GO OUTSIDE AND SEE THAT NEW CAR YOU'VE BEEN HANKERING ON ABOUT."

characters.name: BROWN CHIPMUNK
characters.description: A FAT LITTLE CHIPMUNK CHITTERING AWAY ON TOP OF THE BENCH. "HE SEEMS UPSET," BETTY SAYS, "I WONDER WHY HE'S AGITATED? OH, LOOK WHAT HE'S HOLDING." YOU TAKE A CLOSER LOOK, CLUTCHED TIGHTLY TO THE LITTLE CHIPMUNK'S CHEST IS A BATTERY.

characters.name: EUSTACE
characters.title: SHERIFF EUSTACE
characters.description: A HEAVY SET MAN WEARING A TAN POLICE OUTFIT WITH A POLISHED BRASS STAR EMBLAZONED ON HIS CHEST.
